io.spine.server.aggregate

Class AggregateEndpointDelivery<I,A extends Aggregate<I,?,?>,E extends io.spine.core.ActorMessageEnvelope<?,?,?>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.spine.server.delivery.EndpointDelivery<I,A,E>
      • io.spine.server.aggregate.AggregateEndpointDelivery<I,A,E>
  • Type Parameters:
    I - the ID type of aggregate, to which messages are being delivered
    A - the type of aggregate
    E - the type of message envelope, which is used for message delivery
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AggregateCommandDelivery, AggregateEventDelivery, AggregateRejectionDelivery

    @SPI
public abstract class AggregateEndpointDelivery<I,A extends Aggregate<I,?,?>,E extends io.spine.core.ActorMessageEnvelope<?,?,?>>
extends EndpointDelivery<I,A,E>
    A strategy on delivering the messages to the instances of a certain aggregate type.
